snippet.title: REZ PLZ Console Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
REZ PLZ is a pixel art puzzle platformer where 1-2 players control two wizard brothers that possess the power of resurrection. While traversing through platforming challenges and solving puzzles, you will encounter dangerous monsters and traps that require you to KILL one of the wizard brothers to advance. But thanks to a magical scroll, the brothers are able to resurrect each other from a multitude of one-hit deaths, ranging from being sliced in half, eaten by creatures, burned alive and more. 

Wishlist today on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/911680/REZPLZ/

Follow us on Social Media for updates!

Website- http://www.graffitigames.com/
Twitter- https://twitter.com/Graffiti_Games
Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/GraffitiGamesPublishing/
https://www.instagram.com/graffiti_games/
